author: mrdylanroberts
name: VirusTotalScanner
short: Automatically scan URLs and file attachments using VirusTotal API
description: A comprehensive Discord bot cog that automatically scans URLs and file attachments using the VirusTotal API to detect malicious content and protect your server from scams and malware. Features real-time protection, configurable settings, and detailed threat reports.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores VirusTotal API keys and configuration settings per guild. No personal user data is persistently stored.
